'''House Hetherspoon''' is a noble house of [[The Westerlands]]. They are vassals to [[House Lannister]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Hetherspoon is a house of landed knights sworn to [[Casterly Rock]]. The name of their seat and its location is unknown. Their sigil is an oak spoon within a white cartouche on orange and black lozengy.
